Title: Relates to the confidentiality of information obtained by a city employee in the course of official duties
Summary: Relates to the confidentiality of information obtained by a city employee in the course of official duties; defines terms; provides a procedure for the disclosure of confidential information; further provides a procedure for the collection and recording of confidential information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the confidentiality of information obtained by a city employee in the course of official duties
